universum.studios.android.fragment.transition

Class ExtraFragmentTransitions

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.fragment.transition.ExtraFragmentTransitions

  • public final class ExtraFragmentTransitions
extends Object
    Factory providing extra FragmentTransitions.
    • SCALE_IN_AND_SLIDE_TO_LEFT
    • SCALE_IN_AND_SLIDE_TO_RIGHT

    • SCALE_IN_AND_SLIDE_TO_BOTTOM

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FragmentTransition SCALE_IN_AND_SLIDE_TO_BOTTOM
      Transition that may be used to scale (with fade) a new incoming fragment into the screen from its background and an outgoing (the current one) will be slided out of the screen to the bottom.
      static FragmentTransition SCALE_IN_AND_SLIDE_TO_LEFT
      Transition that may be used to scale (with fade) a new incoming fragment into the screen from its background and an outgoing (the current one) will be slided out of the screen to the left.
      static FragmentTransition SCALE_IN_AND_SLIDE_TO_RIGHT
      Transition that may be used to scale (with fade) a new incoming fragment into the screen from its background and an outgoing (the current one) will be slided out of the screen to the right.
      static FragmentTransition SCALE_IN_AND_SLIDE_TO_TOP
      Transition that may be used to scale (with fade) a new incoming fragment into the screen from its background and an outgoing (the current one) will be slided out of the screen to the top.
      static FragmentTransition SLIDE_TO_BOTTOM_AND_SCALE_OUT
      Transition that may be used to slide a new incoming fragment into the screen from the top and an outgoing (the current one) will be scaled out (with fade) out of the screen to its background.
      static FragmentTransition SLIDE_TO_LEFT_AND_SCALE_OUT
      Transition that may be used to slide a new incoming fragment into the screen from the right and an outgoing (the current one) will be scaled out (with fade) out of the screen to its background.
      static FragmentTransition SLIDE_TO_RIGHT_AND_SCALE_OUT
      Transition that may be used to slide a new incoming fragment into the screen from the left and an outgoing (the current one) will be scaled out (with fade) out of the screen to its background.
      static FragmentTransition SLIDE_TO_TOP_AND_SCALE_OUT
      Transition that may be used to slide a new incoming fragment into the screen from the bottom and an outgoing (the current one) will be scaled out (with fade) out of the screen to its background.

    • Field Detail

      • SCALE_IN_AND_SLIDE_TO_LEFT

        public static final FragmentTransition SCALE_IN_AND_SLIDE_TO_LEFT
        Transition that may be used to scale (with fade) a new incoming fragment into the screen from its background and an outgoing (the current one) will be slided out of the screen to the left.

        Powered by animations:

        • Incoming: R.animator#fragment_scale_in
        • Outgoing: R.animator#fragment_slide_out_left
        • Incoming (back-stack): R.animator#fragment_slide_in_right_back
        • Outgoing (back-stack): R.animator#fragment_scale_out_back

      • SCALE_IN_AND_SLIDE_TO_RIGHT

        public static final FragmentTransition SCALE_IN_AND_SLIDE_TO_RIGHT
        Transition that may be used to scale (with fade) a new incoming fragment into the screen from its background and an outgoing (the current one) will be slided out of the screen to the right.

        Powered by animations:

        • Incoming: R.animator#fragment_scale_in
        • Outgoing: R.animator#fragment_slide_out_right
        • Incoming (back-stack): R.animator#fragment_slide_in_left_back
        • Outgoing (back-stack): R.animator#fragment_scale_out_back

      • SCALE_IN_AND_SLIDE_TO_TOP

        Transition that may be used to scale (with fade) a new incoming fragment into the screen from its background and an outgoing (the current one) will be slided out of the screen to the top.

      • SLIDE_TO_LEFT_AND_SCALE_OUT

        public static final FragmentTransition SLIDE_TO_LEFT_AND_SCALE_OUT
        Transition that may be used to slide a new incoming fragment into the screen from the right and an outgoing (the current one) will be scaled out (with fade) out of the screen to its background.

        Powered by animations:

        • Incoming: R.animator#fragment_slide_in_left
        • Outgoing: R.animator#fragment_scale_out
        • Incoming (back-stack): R.animator#fragment_scale_in_back
        • Outgoing (back-stack): R.animator#fragment_slide_out_right_back

        public static final FragmentTransition SLIDE_TO_RIGHT_AND_SCALE_OUT
        Transition that may be used to slide a new incoming fragment into the screen from the left and an outgoing (the current one) will be scaled out (with fade) out of the screen to its background.

        public static final FragmentTransition SLIDE_TO_TOP_AND_SCALE_OUT
        Transition that may be used to slide a new incoming fragment into the screen from the bottom and an outgoing (the current one) will be scaled out (with fade) out of the screen to its background.
